entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Port Carling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:07 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 9:12 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 84 %

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries or periods of freezing drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 8:29 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:29 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
